title: FS: T205 Clyde Engle HINDU Back

posts.post_title: FS: T205 Clyde Engle HINDU Back
posts.post_content:
This was part of a small find of six Hindu's that was originally offered by REA in last year's auction.

Link: [url]http://www.robertedwardauctions.com/auction/2010/325.html[/url]

$1,000 DLVD:
